segments.text: Hey , Mary . We're back . Have you eaten yet ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I had some bread for breakfast .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It is a meal that combines breakfast and lunch . On Sundays , many Americans sleep late and go out for brunch . Those who go to church without having breakfast have brunch also .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Actually , many Taiwanese wake up late on Sunday mornings , too . It may be a good idea for them to eat brunch instead of eating breakfast and lunch .
segments.speaker: S2
